entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
